text: Dollars in Surrey is a 1921 British silent comedy film directed by George Dewhurst and Anson Dyer and starring Alma Taylor, James Carew and Hugh Clifton.Connelly p.341 ==Cast== * Alma Taylor * James Carew * Hugh Clifton * Gwynne Herbert * Esme Hubbard * Victor Prout * Rolf Leslie * Wallace Bosco ==References== ==Bibliography== * Robert B. Connelly. The Silents: Silent Feature Films, 1910-36. December Press, 1998. ==External links== * Category:1921 films Category:1921 comedy films Category:British films Category:British comedy films Category:British silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by George Dewhurst Category:British black-and-white films Category:Hepworth Pictures films
title: Dollars in Surrey
